title: Puerto Pirata Deli
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Fast food, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Caribbean, Fusion
description: Tiny beach cafe on Corral Beach serving dishes with a mix of the owner's multi-ethnical background, including Caribbean, fusion, indigenous, Indian, and Italian cuisines. Offers sandwiches, gluten free and vegan options, made-in-house truffles using local organic chocolate.
streetAddress: 20m East of Main Bus Station, Puerto Viejo de Talamanca
